system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.MHXQ6uBfaRCgUfgW]{Basic Offensive Form}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.4k8uVqjPvwmxogAK]{Precision Form Focus}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.tbBRjXDVRbf2ZsHH]{Intermediate Offensive Form}

Benefits

A character gains an additional +4 attack bonus to all Called Shot attacks against arms and legs made when attacking with a psiblade or plasblade, gains a +4 attack bonus to all Called Shot attacks against hands and feet when attacking with a psiblade or plasblade, and the character suffers no attack penalty when Aggressive attacking with a psiblade or plasblade. Also, when attacking an object, the character gains a +4 attack bonus and ignores 2 points of hardness.

Normal

Aggressive attacks have an attack penalty of -2.
system.summary: +4 Called Shot bonus, No penalty to aggressive attack, sunder bonus
